data.name: Mad Machines: Grease
data.detailed_description:
We are Indie and our servers need grease.
As a big and warm THANK YOU, you will recieve 1 Big Monkey Wrench weapon!


GREASE DLC includes:
- 1 unique weapon
- 1 for each Class

This offer ends 20.06.2019
data.about_the_game:
We are Indie and our servers need grease.
As a big and warm THANK YOU, you will recieve 1 Big Monkey Wrench weapon!


GREASE DLC includes:

This offer ends 20.06.2019
data.short_description: Grease - We are Indie and our servers need grease - 1 Big Monkey Wrench for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3GHz or AMD FX 8300 @3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 @ 3GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY
